0: If this is your first time hearin' this
1: You are about to experience somethin' so cold, man
2: We never had nothin' handed, took nothin' for granted
3: Took nothin' from no man, man, I'm my own man
4: But as a shorty I looked up to the dopeman
5: Only adult man I knew that wasn't broke, man
8: We don't care what people say
9: This is for my niggas outside all winter
10: Cause this summer they ain't finna say: "next summer I'm finna"
11: Sittin' in the hood like community colleges
12: This dope money here is Lil' Trey's scholarship
13: Cause ain't no tuition for having no ambition
14: And ain't no loans for sittin' your ass at home
15: So we forced to sell crack, rap, and get a job
16: You gotta do somethin' man, your ass is grown
17: The second verse is for my dogs workin' 9 to 5 that still hustle
18: Cause a nigga can't shine off $6.55
20: And bootlegged tapes just to get they cake up
21: We put shit on layaway, then come back
22: We claim other people kids on our income tax
23: We take that money, cop work, then push packs to get paid
24: And we don't care what people say
25: Momma say she wanna move South
26: Scratchin' lottery tickets, eyes on a new house
27: 'Round the same time, Doe ran up in dude house
28: Couldn't get a job, so since he couldn't get work
30: The drug game bulimic, it's hard to get weight
31: A nigga's money is homo, it's hard to get straight
32: But we gon' keep bakin' til the day we get cake
33: And "we don't care what people say"
34: You know the kids gon' act a fool
35: When you stop the programs for after school
40: We scream: "rocks, blow, weed, park", see, now we smart
41: We ain't retards, the way teachers thought
42: Hold up, hold fast, we make more cash
43: Now tell my momma I belong in that slow class
45: They tryna put me on the school bus with the space for the wheelchair
46: I'm tryna get the car with the chromie wheels here
47: They tryna cut our lights out like we don't live here
48: Look what was handed us, fathers abandoned us
49: When we get them hammers, go on, call the ambulance
50: Sometimes I feel no one in this world understands us
51: But "we don't care what people say"
title: We Don't Care
